message.body: FYI I am going to call gas and electric tomorrow and have them transfer the bills over to my name. Could you do research on Internet? I trust you to find a good one so if you want to put it in your name and let me know how much I owe every month that would be great
Also once you are home remind me that we need to pow wow to see what we have and don't and what we need to buy
Ok! Did the sheet she have us just basically say to look at Comcast and Verizon?
Yeah she just said those were our two options and to make sure you have a student id because you might be able to get a discount
Ok. Have you heard anyone say one or the other is better?
I think Comcast is the most reliable in the city so I would say that unless Verizon is significantly cheaper I would go that route
Ok cool. I will figure out what things mean in their plans :)
Yay! Thanks! I will let you know when the utilities stuff is taken care of
